items.question: How does the text to speech work?
items.answer: Our AI technology converts text into natural-sounding speech using advanced neural networks.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: We support over 50 languages with multiple accent options for major languages.

items.question: Is the service free?
items.answer: Yes, basic text-to-speech features are free to use with limited duration.

items.question: What file formats can I upload?
items.answer: We support TXT, PDF, DOC, DOCX, and other common document formats.

items.question: Can I download the audio files?
items.answer: Yes, you can download audio in MP3, WAV, and other popular formats.
